title: Excruciating Deep Love with You - Novel Updates
genre: Adult   Drama   Josei   Mature   Romance   Slice of Life   Tragedy
tags: Absent Parents   Abusive Characters   Blackmail   Bullying   Crime   Cruel Characters   Death of Loved Ones   Depictions of Cruelty   Depression   Emotionally Weak Protagonist   Family   Female Protagonist   Handsome Male Lead   Hospital   Near-Death Experience   Obsessive Love   Pregnancy   Revenge   R*pe   S*xual Abuse   Sickly Characters   Terminal Illness   Unrequited Love   Weak Protagonist   Wealthy Characters
author: Tong Fei
description:
He said I was the most despicable woman he ever met…

In order to love him, I lost my family, and become an imprisoned tool used for his vengeance from a noble lady. Everyone said I was the daughter of a rapist… I cautiously maintained the excruciating deep love for him and suffered from mental and physical exhaustion…

I thought someday my love would touch him and then I would live a happy life just as a fairy tale, but in fact I fell into an eternal nightmare…>
